title: Don't send your daughter
creator_credit: Robin Roger Cook and Audio-Visual Aids, University of Melbourne
brief_description: Produced for the Students Representative Council, University of Melbourne, this film summarises the first year of life at the University. It shows new students at the “freshers” camp at Anglesea; the main sections of the University; view of the library and instructions how to use it; scenes at the Cabaret Ball; an Engineering School lecture; sports activities; graduating ceremony; exams.
